Package swervelib.simulation.ironmaple.simulation.seasonspecific.crescendo2024

Class CrescendoAmp

java.lang.Object
swervelib.simulation.ironmaple.simulation.Goal
swervelib.simulation.ironmaple.simulation.seasonspecific.crescendo2024.CrescendoAmp
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimulatedArena.Simulatable
public class CrescendoAmp extends Goal

Simulates a AMPS on the field.

This class simulates the AMP on the field where NOTESs can be scored.

  • Method Details

    • addPoints

      protected void addPoints()
      Description copied from class: Goal

      Adds points when a piece has been successfully scored in this goal

      Since this function is the only trigger called when a piece is scored it may handle other small things outside of adding points.
      Specified by:
